name: Generic Rush
description:
Game Description

Generic Rush is an infinite arcade cyberpunk racer. Emerge into high speeds through time and space. Feel adrenaline crushing through your vains, as you avoid devastating obstacles while charging into a dynamic vortex. Do not lose your mind as you make your way through dodging hell to dominate the top of the leaderboards. Do you dare?

Developed as a two-man student project since April 2018. 

Features
- immersive high speed gameplay
- streamlined and fluid controls
- random generated tunnels
- dynamic difficulty adjustment
- global leaderboards
- customisable controls and camera
